title: High Latency Investigation
steps: Check recent deploys - latency issues often correlate with code changes
Review error logs for timeout or connection errors
Check database connection pool metrics
Verify downstream service health (payment, inventory)
Check memory and CPU utilization for resource exhaustion
If recent deploy suspected, consider rollback
escalation: If unable to identify root cause after 30 minutes, page platform-oncall

title: Payment Processing Failures
steps: Check Stripe status page for outages
Review payment service logs for error patterns
Verify API keys are valid and not expired
Check rate limiting - are we hitting Stripe limits?
If Stripe is healthy, check our payment SDK version
Enable fallback payment processor if available
escalation: Page payments-oncall immediately for payment outages

title: Emergency Rollback Procedure
steps: Verify the issue started after a recent deploy
Check if rollback is safe (no database migrations in the release)
Run: kubectl rollout undo deployment/checkout
Monitor metrics for recovery
If rollback doesn't help, the issue may not be deploy-related
escalation: If rollback fails or causes new issues, page platform-oncall

title: Stock Synchronization Issues
steps: Check warehouse API connectivity
Review sync job logs for errors
Verify database consistency
Trigger manual sync if needed
